body_html:
Thanks for clarifying. I'm running r1.4 and the above-mentioned commit 9fe7c29 is not part of r1.4. I'll give it a try.

I'm closing this as there is no way to configure this. But can I know the reason why it's like that? Or can I open another issue as a feature request?

body:
Thanks for clarifying. I'm running r1.4 and the above-mentioned commit https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/9fe7c29605a5ee1519cceba8e67a6d8413444fac is not part of r1.4. I'll give it a try.

I'm closing this as there is no way to configure this. But can I know the reason why it's like that? Or can I open another issue as a feature request?
